author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- Added fillDescriptions
   - This required removing unused parameters from config files
- Used ESGetToken and consumes were needed
- Have ParameterSet only used by ESProducer and not helpers
- Combined header and source for ESProducer and removed modules.cc

#### PR validation:

Ran workflow 4.17 successfully after the change.
title: Modernized ES modules in RecoTracker/MeasurementDet
